snippet: A dog food company first issued a recall of several varieties of chicken treats last week after the Georgia Department of Agriculture found salmonella in the product.
abstract: Dog food company Bailey's Choice expands recall of its teriyaki dog treats over salmonella concerns; recall now includes Georgia, North Carolina, South Carolina, Virgina, Delaware and Tennessee.
lead_paragraph: A dog food company first issued a recall of several varieties of chicken treats last week after the Georgia Department of Agriculture found salmonella in the product.

headline.main: Georgia: Recall of Dog Treats Is Expanded
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Recall of Dog Treats Is Expanded
